descriptions: Does not identify any benefits of physical activity.
Identifies only one benefit of physical activity.
Identifies two benefits of physical activity, but the descriptions are vague.
Identifies three benefits of physical activity with some detail.
Clearly identifies four distinct benefits of physical activity with good detail.
Clearly and comprehensively identifies five or more distinct benefits of physical activity with excellent detail and provides supporting information.
Demonstrates no understanding of how physical activity impacts the body.
Shows minimal understanding of the physiological impact of physical activity.
Shows basic understanding of how physical activity affects one bodily system (e.g., cardiovascular).
Explains how physical activity impacts at least two bodily systems with some accuracy.
Explains how physical activity impacts multiple bodily systems with good accuracy and provides examples.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of how physical activity impacts various bodily systems, explaining the physiological mechanisms with excellent accuracy and relevant examples.
Does not recognize any mental or emotional benefits of physical activity.
Mentions only one vague mental or emotional benefit.
Identifies a basic mental or emotional benefit, such as stress reduction.
Describes two mental/emotional benefits with some explanation.
Clearly articulates three or more mental/emotional benefits of physical activity with supporting details.

Provides a thorough and insightful explanation of multiple mental/emotional benefits, including the relationship between physical activity and mental well-being, and potentially cites relevant research or examples.
